name: After(life)Party
description:
The Afterlife party is the biggest event of the year and you want to attend, but everyone knows you have to be dead to get in. Too bad that you are an immortal witch.
Maybe if you best the 5 guardians of death at a game, they'll be willing to turn you?

Beat your opponents by all means necessary! Keep an eye on your progress and decide when to play it safe or when to take risks.

You can also use a spell or your cute demeanor to distract your opponents, but careful - you can only do each of them once before reaching the party!

Made for the UT Pro Game Jam 2023!
